thread.title: Xbox Live Architect Leaves Microsoft After 18 Years
thread.title_full: Xbox Live Architect Leaves Microsoft After 18 Years

title: Xbox Live Architect Leaves Microsoft After 18 Years
text:
Xbox Live Architect Leaves Microsoft After 18 Years 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
Eric Neustadter, an 18-year Microsoft veteran who spent 14.5 of those years on the Xbox team, has left the company. His last day at the Redm...
